name: Zeagoo Womens V Neck Camisole Tank Top Strap Sleeveless T Shirt Casual Loose Vest Blouse - S-XXL

title: Super comfortable
content: When I ordered the shirts, it Said it was going to be Delivered less than 24 hours. that turned into three weeks. I was a little frustrated as i ordered it for a specific time were I was going out of town and it was it in on time as promised. I did reach out to customer service and they were a big help. When I finally got the tank top in, it was super soft and very comfortable to wear. It‚Äôs also a Bit on the loose side, so it‚Äôs not a snug fit at all. It‚Äôs definitely a loser fitting tank top. You can truly dress it up or dress it down. I love this tank top!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2024

title: Nice design. Fast shopping
content: I‚Äôve now ordered four of these. Quality is not great. If you zoom in you can see the discolouration in the fabric - like ‚Äúwater marks‚Äù that have been on every single one of them - I‚Äôm so tired of returning them and reordering that I‚Äôm just keeping this one to wear at the beach - I‚Äôm giving up. I‚Äôm 130lbs 5‚Äô5 34DD. The M is HUGE. There is so much material - it hangs way below armpits and def shows my strapless bra band and would show major side boob. There‚Äôs no avoiding it. A S is too big too. The material is quite stretchy and therefore won‚Äôt shrink - I‚Äôd most definitely size down. Probably wouldn‚Äôt recommend to anyone.

title: Verified Purchase
content: Fits just a tad large (just like in the model's photos), but it just adds to the comfyness of the tank top.
